thread.title: Bedroom fire after using cheap phone charger
thread.title_full: Bedroom fire after using cheap phone charger | West Country - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Bedroom fire after using cheap phone charger
text:
A mum from Exmouth, Devon has issued a warning after her daughter's bedroom was wrecked by a fire.
The fire was caused by a cheap iPhone charger purchased from a high street bargain shop.
Ella Dye, 13, woke up in the middle of the night to use the bathroom. When she returned, just a few moments later, her pillow and duvet had been set alight.
The top floor of the family's home was largely destroyed and the Dye's won't be able to live there for approximately for 3 months.
Ella's bedroom after the fire Credit: Jacqui Dye, Facebook Jacqui, Ella's mum, is now warning others about the dangers of 'cheap' and unofficial mobile phone chargers.
She said, "I would just urge people to buy original ones or use the proper one provided, don't have them on at night or on soft furnishings."
The fire brigade has confirmed that the cause of the fire was an electrical fault.
Credit: Jacqui Dye, Facebook Exeter Devon
